DVDs for Rares?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Town Hall (Polls): MR4 Polls: DVDs for Rares?
By Lisa Shock on Saturday, March 15, 2003 - 08:03 pm:

If you could suggest 5 DVDs for Tecmo to make rares for in MR4, what would they be? (Remember, list only 5, and they have to be currently available in stores!)

Thread closed on 4/16, all items submitted

2) Take a guess...*
3) Dragon

By Corpse on Monday, March 17, 2003 - 11:05 am:

1.In the Mouth of Madness=a rare Suezo, named "Kane"
2.Dark Shadows (any disk of any of the collections)= A rare vampire looking Gitan or Joker. (to redeem for how crappy this great series has done for monsters on MR3)
3.Requiem For a Dream=some sort of rare Moochi, for two reasons. One, this movie was the only movie out of the thousand or so that I've seen in my lifetime that's disturbed me, and two, I do not like the Moochi breed at all.
4.A Nightmare on Elm Street=Some sort of evil looking rare Kato
5.SLC Punk= A punk looking rare Tiger, with a neon-green mowhawk.
